interfacePack
Interface DeviceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDeviceModule, AbstractInstrumentModule, AbstractSignalModule, RealInstrumentModule, RealSignalModule1, RealSignalModule2, SimulatedInstrumentModule, TestRackSimulator1, TestRackSimulator2
public interface DeviceInterface

This interface defines the basic behaviors of a device

Author:
tianzhao

Method Summary
 boolean allPortsClosed()
          This function tells if all the ports of a device are currently closed
 boolean configureConnection()
          This function configures the connection between the software module and the actual device The device can be either a simulated device or a real device.
 boolean containsPort(int portIndex)
          This function checks if a port exists at the current device
 void disablePort(int portIndex)
          This function let a device close one of its ports
 void enablePort(int portIndex)
          This function let a device open one of its ports
 int getDataBufferSize()
          This function gets the size of the data buffer
 boolean getDataFromDevice()
          Developers need to implement this function to either: establish connection to a real device, prepare data and open ports for other devices to read from or: implement a simulated device, prepare data and open ports for other devices to read from.
 java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double> getDataFromPort(int portIndex)
          This function is used to get output data from a single port of the current device.
 java.lang.String getDeviceName()
          This function gets the name of the device
 java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> getIndicesOfAllActivePorts()
          This function returns indices of all open ports
 java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> getIndicesOfAllPorts()
          This function returns a set of port indices
 int getNumOfPorts()
          This function gets the number of output ports
 java.lang.String getXAxisName()
          This function gets the name of xAxis
 java.lang.String getYAxisName()
          This function gets the name of yAxis
 void initializePortUsability(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Boolean> activePortMap)
          This function uses a map of active ports to initialize all the ports
 void initializePortUsability(int maxPortNum, boolean f)
          This function is used by device constructor to set all ports to open / closed
 boolean isAnActivePort(int portIndex)
          This function checks if port specified by portIndex is an open port
 boolean prepareDataForReading(int portIndex, java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double> dataPointsArray)
          This function processes data read from the portIndex'th port of the device
 boolean reset()
          Developers need to implement this function to reset the device
 void setDataBufferSize(int bufferSize)
          This function sets the size of the data buffer that will carry the output data from a device
 void setDeviceName(java.lang.String deviceName)
          This function sets the name of the device
 void setNumOfPorts(int numOfPorts)
          This function sets the number of output ports from this device

          This function sets the name of the xAxis of data
 void setYAxisName(java.lang.String yName)
          This function sets the name of the yAxis of data
